column1: Little Goat Diner////Spiced Apple Pancakes - were good
column2: but not great.  While I enjoyed some aspects of this dish
column3: I don't think I would order it again.  My best bites had a good amount of the oatmeal crumble on them
column4: but there were many bites that were simply just "meh."  My partner said she wished there was more of the cream cheese butter on the pancakes
column5: but she also said she didn't taste any type of spice flavor and I agreed.
